name: insforge
description: InsForge - Open source backend-as-a-service with PostgreSQL and MCP integration

scripts.dev:backend:debug: cd backend && cross-env DEBUG_MODE=true npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend:debug: cd frontend && cross-env VITE_DEBUG_MODE=true npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:backend && npm run format:check:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: InsForge
